name: Color Ships (Indiminus Games)
description:
Hi Recruit!

My name is  S.D.I.A. and I will guide you through your test to become a great capitan for the S.D.A.

The objective.

As future pilot of our forces you must be prepared to destroy any possible danger in our solar system; even being prepared for a possible invasion.  

Destroy all targets that come to your ship.  The controls.

To complete your task you must select an specific type of weapon depending on the type of target.

Z - Red weapon
X - Blue weapon
C - Yellow weapon
V - Activate shields

With enought targets destroyed the shield bar will load.

When the bar is full you can activate the shields of your ship using the V key. 
This will help you cover some hits.

 The customization.

You can customize your targets in the options menu.
